headline: 2024 Presidential Election Trump Comments Bidens Age
summary: In an interview on Wednesday with Megyn Kelly, former President Donald Trump dismissed concerns that President Joe Biden was too old to run for re-election, but called Biden "grossly incompetent."Key Details:Recent pollssuggest as much as 75% of voters think Biden is too old to serve another four-year term as president. Those polls also show more than 50% of respondents saying the same about Trump.Key Quote: "CROOKED JOE BIDEN is NOT too OLD, he is too INCOMPETENT!" Trump wrote in aTruth Social postMonday.For Context: The dilemma of aging politicians has become a concern for both Republicans and Democrats, as SenatorsMitch McConnell(R-KY) andDianne Feinstein(D-CA) have faced recent health issues and questions about their ability to serve. Roughly 76% of Americans now support a mandatory mental competency test for politicians over 75, according to arecent poll.How the Media Covered it: Some right-rated sources noted that the ages of Biden and Trump have prompted the No Labels Party to consider nominating a presidential candidate to challenge them. Some left-rated sources noted that Trump's 2024 Republican primary rival Ron DeSantis recently expressed concerns over the ages of both candidates.
